mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watering (myplant_id, date_at) VALUES (#{myplantId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT w.watering_id, w.myplant_id, p.name myplant_name, NULL memo, w.date_at, 'WATERING' type FROM watering w JOIN myplant p ON w.myplant_id = p.myplant_id WHERE w.date_at >= #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND w.date_at < #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY w.date_at ASC

SELECT d.diary_id, d.myplant_id, p.name myplant_name, d.memo, d.created_at date_at, 'DIARY' type FROM diary d JOIN myplant p ON d.myplant_id = p.myplant_id WHERE d.created_at >= #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND d.created_at < #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY date_at ASC
